word[0]: get on the wrong side of somebody
definition[0]: to annoy someone or make them angry, especially someone who can cause serious problems for you
example[0]: Be careful not to get on the wrong side of her.
definition[1]: to do something that gives someone a bad opinion of you, so that they do not like or respect you in the future
